select
from db_department where department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and department_status != 0

mapper.select:
SELECT u.department_id as departmentId, u.department_name as departmentName, u.established_time as establishedTime, u.department_principal as departmentPrincipal, u.department_principal_tel as departmentPrincipalTel, u.company_id as companyId, u.company_name as companyName, u.department_status as departmentStatus from db_department u
LIMIT #{start},#{limit}

sql.where:
u.department_status <> '0'
and (u.department_name LIKE CONCAT(#{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') OR u.department_principal LIKE CONCAT(#{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') )
